LightningComponentBundle.description: Display Related Record Files With the Record Flexipage.

property.name: startWith
property.label: Starts With
property.description: A filter to only show documents whose titles start with this text.

property.name: contains
property.label: Contains
property.description: A filter to only show documents whose titles contain this text.

property.name: emptyStateMessage
property.label: Empty State Message
property.description: Text to display if file was not found.
